channel.title: How to pass variables or parameters from one Joomla article to another using DirectPHP?
channel.description: Discuss How to pass variables or parameters from one Joomla article to another using DirectPHP?

item.title: Marc says:
item.description: I'am using joomla vers 3.4.8. I added the plugin, and php part is working. but i tried to pass variables as above but it doesn't work. I typed the url in the browser. the page with article shows up, but not my variable. did I miss any setting in Joomla? Regards Marc
item.dc:creator: Marc

item.title: kksou says:
item.description: Hi Paul, You can pass any parameters. The key thing is whether your module can receive that. So you need to look at your module how it retrieves those parameters. E.g. if it uses $_GET, then you can use DirectPHP to pass the variables as method=GET. However, if it uses $_POST, then you have to use method=POST. Warm Regards, /kksou
item.dc:creator: kksou

item.title: Paul Seyler says:
item.description: Is it possible to use this technique to pass values from a page to a module ON the page?
